text: The Museum of Mathematics of Aragon (Spanish: Museo de Matemáticas de Aragón) is a mathematics museum located in Huesca, next to the city's planetarium. == History == The idea of opening a mathematics museum in Huesca began in 2019, when the museum opened in the Casbas Monastery. On 15 July 2019 it opened to the public. In 2021, the Museum moved to the Huesca technology park, next to the planetarium, where it is currently located. == References == Category:Museums in Spain
title: Museum of Mathematics of Aragon
